title: Lomma Beach House
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, International, Delivery, Take-out, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Serves made-in-house food with several vegan choices, including dessert. Has a laid-back relaxing atmosphere where you can hang out in a hammock under the beach sun or tables and chairs. Serves ice cream, drinks, coffee and snacks. Hours listed are for June-September.
